name: trend_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool twitter_pack_v2.
Tool description: Complete pack to get any public information on twitter, includes Twitter Trends, Search Tweet, User Activity
API description: Fetches trending topics from Twitter based on a given "Where On Earth IDentifier" (WOEID) using the Toolbench RapidAPI service.

woeid.description: The Yahoo! Where On Earth IDentifier (WOEID) for which to get trending topics.
